meanings.definition: A person who believes in the existence of only one God.
meanings.sent1: The monotheist prayed to their one God every day.
meanings.sent2: She is a monotheist who follows the teachings of one God.
meanings.sent3: The monotheist joked that their God must be very busy with all the prayers.
meanings.sent4: In a world of many gods, the monotheist stood out like a single star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The monotheist's faith in one God was unwavering and strong.

meanings.definition: Believing in the existence of only one God.
meanings.sent1: The monotheist belief shaped their entire worldview.
meanings.sent2: She held a monotheist perspective that influenced her decisions.
meanings.sent3: The monotheist idea of one God seemed so simple yet profound.
meanings.sent4: His monotheist faith was like a beacon of light in a dark world.
meanings.sent5: The monotheist principle guided her moral compass with clarity.
